channel.title: Update Warning?
channel.description:
Well I've seen this in alot of servers but I don't know the code or where to put or how to use!
So what I want is the code for the update warning, like when I want to update the server the counter appears on the screen like rs2 you know... well I want the code where to put and how to use. Please Help :|

item.title: Update Warning?
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

With your other commands…

Example usage:

::update 30

Will set a timer to 30 seconds.

Read full topic

item.title: Update Warning?
item.dc:creator: @Vert Vert
item.description:
@Vert wrote:

ok thanks but where do i put and how it works?

Read full topic

item.title: Update Warning?
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Here is mine.

	if (command.startsWith("update") && command.length() > 7) {
	if (playerRights >= 2) {
	PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = (Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)) + 1);
	PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false;
	PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true;
	PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
	PlayerHandler.messageToAll = ""+playerName+": To make sure ur account is safe. Logg before the timer finishes. Thanks!";
	}
	}

That will also, send a message to everyone on the server syaing. To make sure your account is safe. Logg before the timer finishes. Thanks!..

And it will say the players name before it, like…
X-J-K-X: To make sure your account is safe. Logg before the timer finishes! Thanks!

Read full topic
